commented_code:
-## Base image for all building stages

discussion_comments.comment_body: 可以把 node 基线版本拉到 22 了。 目前 22已经是 LTS，我在 preview 上跑了一段时间了没遇到什么问题。

commented_code:
-## Base image for all the stages
-FROM node:20-slim AS base
+## Base image for all building stages
+FROM node:lts-slim AS base

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
-## Base image for all the stages
-FROM node:20-slim AS base
+## Base image for all building stages
+FROM node:lts-slim AS base
discussion_comments.comment_body: node:lts 是否会存在持续更新的问题？比如假设现在是20，到某个时间之后自动升级到 22 ？

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
-## Base image for all the stages
-FROM node:20-slim AS base
+## Base image for all building stages
+FROM node:lts-slim AS base
discussion_comments.comment_body: 这个会，如果 NODE 发布新的 LTS 的话，~~固定下版本？~~ 已固定为 20

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
-## Base image for all the stages
-FROM node:20-slim AS base
+## Base image for all building stages
+FROM node:lts-slim AS base
discussion_comments.comment_body: 我建议基础镜像固定版本，这个自动升级可能会有破坏性更新的风险
